data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Dev Accelerator Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 17 2025 the equity shares of Dev Accelerator Ltd (Scrip Code: 544513) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250916- dated September 16 2025.
